actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that it offer its congratulations to Americans that participated in the XIII Winter Olympic Games in Lake Placid, New York.

summary.text: Congratulates the members of the 1980 U.S. Winter Olympic team, its coaches and officials for a job well done. Recognizes the International Olympic Committee, the U.S. Olympic Committee, the Lake Placid Olympic Organizing Committee, and the people of the Lake Placid area for their successful efforts in organizing and producing the XIII Winter Olympic Games.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that it offer its congratulations to Americans that participated in the XIII Winter Olympic Games in Lake Placid, New York.
